biotools.summary: Computes genomic breeding values using external information on the markers. The package fits a linear mixed model with heteroscedastic random effects, where the random effect variance is fitted using a linear predictor and a log link.

bioschemas.name: CodataGS
bioschemas.summary: Computes genomic breeding values using external information on the markers. The package fits a linear mixed model with heteroscedastic random effects, where the random effect variance is fitted using a linear predictor and a log link.
